results.name: If A262693(n) = 1, then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A049820(n)).
comment: Distance of node n from the infinite trunk (A259934) of the tree defined by edge-relation A049820(child) = parent.
Zero-based row index to array A263255.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10002
formula: If A262693(n) = 1 [when n is in A259934], then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A049820(n)).
xref: Cf. A263257 (positions of records, where each n first occurs).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 07 2015
